channel.title: Quest idea? [and another question]
channel.description:
Ight my server has 4 quests. 1 to unlock piety. 1 to unlock ancients. and 2 for lunars. now if you do ::lunars and ::ancients it switches the book. is there a way i can change it so you have to have the quest done first.
How do i clip npc's?

item.title: Quest idea? [and another question]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Solved the quest part. but what about clipping Npc’s???

Read full topic

item.title: Quest idea? [and another question]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

ExtremeX-Scape™:

I’m not spoon feeding you.

This is the code i currently have:

if(command.startsWith("lunar")){ if (characterQ10 <= 1){ setSidebarInterface(6, 18787); } else { sM("you need to do the lunar quest in order to switch to this magic book."); } }
now when i set this i get 100 + errors. i do not see any, but id like to see if you can pick one out.

Read full topic

item.title: Quest idea? [and another question]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“ExtremeX-Scape™, post:2, topic:406426”] if (command.startsWith("lunar")) { if (lunarQuest == 1) { magicBook = 3; // 1 normal, 2 ancient, 3 lunar } else { sendChatMessage("you need to do the lunar quest in order to switch to this magic book."); } }

Do not use this I’m just showing what it potentially could look like, and giving you an idea of what it should look like.[/quote]
so my server uses q-1 q-2 and so on. for some reason the lunar spirit quest (the one needed for lunars) is q-10. how would i go about setting that up

it looks something like this:
q-1: 0 (this one means its not started)
q-1: 1 (this means its started)
q-1: 15 (this means its finished)
those are just an example of the first quest.

Read full topic

item.title: Quest idea? [and another question]
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

			if (command.startsWith("lunar")) {
				if (lunarQuest == 1) {
					magicBook = 3; // 1 normal, 2 ancient, 3 lunar
				} else {
					sendChatMessage("you need to do the lunar quest in order to switch to this magic book.");
				}
			}

Do not use this I’m just showing what it potentially could look like, and giving you an idea of what it should look like.

Read full topic
